title: COVID-19 vaccine - for people with a weakened immune system
description: This leaflet explains about a third dose of the COVID-19 vaccine being offered to people with a severely weakened immune system to boost their protection against the COVID-19 virus. A large print accessible version of this leaflet is available below as a Word document.
